title: What are the three ancient methods to increase your mental and physical power through fascination?
first_phrase: This text delves into the topic of fascination and provides various methods and exercises to develop the power of the eyes, including the mental picture method, the solar plexus method, the muscular method, and the Virgil T. method. The section also discusses the use of symbols, numbers, and mandalas in increasing the fascinative force. The last 200 tokens provide a summary of the three methods of increasing the power of the eyes, including fixity of the look, rapacity of the look and expression of the look. The author recommends following the prescriptions precisely to obtain remarkable results.

Exercise 27 a While in front of a mirror, you should fix your gaze on the third eye without batting your eyelids. You should pursue this exercise gradually, until you can manage to extend its duration. Refer in this regard to the instructions applicable to the next exercise.
